headline.main: ARABS SEE BRITISH PLEDGING FREEDOM; Three Recent Declarations Are Held to Herald National Independence After War

lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM, Sept. 20 -- Arabic peoples regard three British statements of the past three months as not only unequivocal official declarations that guarantee Arab independence but also as foundation stones for Arabian unity.
